k, a, b = list(map(int, input().split()))
ans = 0
if b < 0:
    a *= -1
    b *= -1
    (b, a) = (a, b)
if a > 0 and b >= 0:
    ans += b // k - (a - 1) // k
else:
    ans += b // k
    ans += 1
    ans += (-a)//k

print(ans)

k, a, b = input().split(' ')
k = int(k)
a = int(a)
b = int(b)
if (a == b) and (a % k == 0):
    print('1')
else:
    if (a * b > 0):
        a = abs(a)
        b = abs(b)
        if (a > b):
            tmp = a
            a = b
            b = tmp
        print((b // k) - ((a - 1) // k))
    elif (a * b < 0):
        if (a > 0):
            tmp = a
            a = b
            b = tmp
        print((b // k) + (abs(a) // k) + 1)
    else:
        a = abs(a)
        b = abs(b)
        if (a != 0):
            tmp = a
            a = b
            b = tmp
        print((b // k) + 1)
